metadata.title: CVE-2024-5198 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: OpenVPN ovpn-dco for Windows version 1.1.1 allows an unprivileged localattacker to send I/O control messages with invalid data to the driverresulting in a NULL pointer dereference leading to a system halt.

criterions.comment: openvpn package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
